name: Ranger & The Zombie Horde
description:
Trailer

Top-Down Arcade Zombie Slaughter Madness!!!!!

Slaughter the zombie horde, unlock newer & stronger weapons, and upgrade your bunker in order to survive the onslaught.

Rescue survivors and put them to work hoarding ammo, collecting scraps, or becoming engineers to build you newer and stronger equipment!

Loot zombies for ammo and scraps!

Play It Now!
